ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_isclm | |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` W ) = ( CCfld |`s ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) /\ ( Base ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simp1bi | |- ( W e. CMod -> W e. LMod ) |
